Thunderous Smite

Level 1 Evocation Spell

Pushes your target 3m away and possibly knocks it Prone.

Thunderous Smite is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Thunderous Smite is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
